thread.section_title: Travelgenio opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Travelgenio | www.travelgenio.com
thread.title: Gemma Newman

author: Gemma Newman
title: Gemma Newman
text: Just booked, been sent a confirmation email. Two hours layer I get two emails saying it's been cancelled because they can't verify my card, and give me a dodgy link to a worldpay site. My card statement shows the transaction is going through, however it is a holding payment. What is going on? I'm not paying a penny more. I don't seem to be able to find customer service contacts. Another nightmare online company.
